Littleton Parks, Recreation and Community Education Register Programs Search Activities Memberships Gift Certificates Facilities Facility List Calendar General Info Dept Info Team Info Contact Contact Us Help How to Register Affiliates Municipal Site Account Login Create Account Account Login Create Account Register Programs Search Activities Memberships Gift Certificates Facilities Facility List Calendar General Info Dept Info Team Info Contact Contact Us Help How to Register Affiliates Municipal Site Register Now Skip to nav Adult Coed Volleyball • Register • View Cart • Location:  LMS Gym, Littleton, MA This upbeat co-ed volleyball program offers adults the opportunity to enjoy all the excitement of competitive volleyball in a friendly and supportive environment.  Previous playing experience (ability to bump, set and hit) required for joining either night.  Each evening, participants will initially be divided into 2 teams, which are then shuffled half way through to re-balance play.  Come join the fun, meet people, and benefit from the exercise! Registration and full payment preferred, however we do accept drop-ins on a space available basis – drop in fee is $10/pp/time. Fall Session: Thursdays 10/8-12/18 | 8:30pm-10:30pm (NO SESSION ON 11/27 Thanksgiving) Location: Littleton Middle School Gym Cost: $75.00 R/ $85.00 NR (10 Sessions) DROP-INS: $10R/ $10NR Winter Session: Thursdays 1/9-3/26 | 8:30pm-10:30pm (NO SESSION ON 02/20 SCHOOL VACATION WEEK) Location: Littleton Middle School Gym Cost: $82.50R/ $92.50NR (11 Sessions) DROP-INS: $10R/ $10NR Spring Session: Thursdays Location: Littleton Middle School Gym 4/2-6/11 | 8:30pm-10:30pm (NO SESSION ON 04/23 SCHOOL VACATION WEEK) Cost: $75R/ $85NR (10 Sessions) DROP-INS: $10R/ $10NR Register Activity Ages Grades Days Date/Time Fees Log In Adult Coed Volleyball Fall Session THURSDAYS F25AV14 18y - 99y N/A Th 10/09/2025 - 12/18/2025 08:30 PM - 10:30 PM Littleton Middle School - Gym See Options Please show up ready to play, bring your own water Log In Adult Coed Volleyball Winter Session THURSDAYS W26AV14 18y - 99y N/A Th 01/08/2026 - 03/26/2026 08:30 PM - 10:30 PM Littleton Middle School - Gym See Options Please show up ready to play, bring your own water Log In Adult Coed Volleyball Spring Session THURSDAYS S26AV14 18y - 99y N/A Th 04/02/2026 - 06/11/2026 08:30 PM - 10:30 PM Littleton Middle School - Gym See Options Please show up ready to play, bring your own water * Adjustments and discounts will be applied during checkout if applicable. * Return to Programs View All Activities Share This Page:

Register Now

Adult Coed Volleyball • Register • View Cart • Location:  LMS Gym, Littleton, MA This upbeat co-ed volleyball program offers adults the opportunity to enjoy all the excitement of competitive volleyball in a friendly and supportive environment.  Previous playing experience (ability to bump, set and hit) required for joining either night.  Each evening, participants will initially be divided into 2 teams, which are then shuffled half way through to re-balance play.  Come join the fun, meet people, and benefit from the exercise! Registration and full payment preferred, however we do accept drop-ins on a space available basis – drop in fee is $10/pp/time. Fall Session: Thursdays 10/8-12/18 | 8:30pm-10:30pm (NO SESSION ON 11/27 Thanksgiving) Location: Littleton Middle School Gym Cost: $75.00 R/ $85.00 NR (10 Sessions) DROP-INS: $10R/ $10NR Winter Session: Thursdays 1/9-3/26 | 8:30pm-10:30pm (NO SESSION ON 02/20 SCHOOL VACATION WEEK) Location: Littleton Middle School Gym Cost: $82.50R/ $92.50NR (11 Sessions) DROP-INS: $10R/ $10NR Spring Session: Thursdays Location: Littleton Middle School Gym 4/2-6/11 | 8:30pm-10:30pm (NO SESSION ON 04/23 SCHOOL VACATION WEEK) Cost: $75R/ $85NR (10 Sessions) DROP-INS: $10R/ $10NR Register Activity Ages Grades Days Date/Time Fees Log In Adult Coed Volleyball Fall Session THURSDAYS F25AV14 18y - 99y N/A Th 10/09/2025 - 12/18/2025 08:30 PM - 10:30 PM Littleton Middle School - Gym See Options Please show up ready to play, bring your own water Log In Adult Coed Volleyball Winter Session THURSDAYS W26AV14 18y - 99y N/A Th 01/08/2026 - 03/26/2026 08:30 PM - 10:30 PM Littleton Middle School - Gym See Options Please show up ready to play, bring your own water Log In Adult Coed Volleyball Spring Session THURSDAYS S26AV14 18y - 99y N/A Th 04/02/2026 - 06/11/2026 08:30 PM - 10:30 PM Littleton Middle School - Gym See Options Please show up ready to play, bring your own water * Adjustments and discounts will be applied during checkout if applicable. * Return to Programs View All Activities Share This Page:
